The tweet by Sen: Shelley Moore Capito stating that opioid overdose deaths are down 8.5% in West Virginia.
The link provided in the tweet to a USA: 3. The breakdown of the data from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) showing a 8.5% decrease in overdose deaths in West Virginia.
The additional data from the CDC report: deaths from all opioids and synthetic opioids increased during the same time period.
